name: The Dresden Dolls
description: '''The Dresden Dolls''' is an American musical duo from [[Boston, Massachusetts]]. Formed in 2000, the group consists of [[Amanda Palmer]] (lead vocals and piano; additional: keyboards, harmonica, ukulele) and [[Brian Viglione]] (drums and backing vocals; additional: guitar, bass guitar). The two describe their style as "[[Bertolt Brecht|Brechtian]] [[punk rock|punk]] [[cabaret]]", a phrase invented by Palmer because she was "terrified" that the press would invent a name that "would involve the word ''[[Goth subculture|gothic]]''". The Dresden Dolls aesthetic exemplifies [[dark cabaret]].
